title: Subchapter A - Video Lottery Gaming
content:
Subchapter A - Video Lottery Gaming

State Regulations

Part 5100 - General Provisions, Construction And Application of Rules (§ 5100.1 to 5100.9/5100.37)

Part 5101 - Information And Filings (§ 5101.1 to 5101.2)

Part 5102 - General Provisions Regarding Licensing And Registration (§ 5102.1 to 5102.19)

Part 5103 - Video Lottery Gaming Agents (§ 5103.1 to 5103.8)

Part 5104 - Financial Stability Of Video Lottery Gaming Agents (§ 5104.1 to 5104.3)

Part 5105 - Video Lottery Gaming Key Employee And Employee Licensing (§ 5105.1 to 5105.5)

Part 5106 - Video Lottery Gaming Vendor Licensing (§ 5106.1 to 5106.3)

Part 5107 - Personnel Assigned To The Operation Of Video Lottery Gaming Facilities (§ 5107.1 to 5107.2)

Part 5108 - Internal Controls Governing The Operation Of Video Lottery Gaming (§ 5108.1 to 5108.4)

Part 5109 - Financial Controls For Video Lottery Gaming Agents (§ 5109.1 to 5109.3)

Part 5110 - Pool Calculations (§ 5110.1 to 5110.4)

Part 5111 - Fees (§ 5111.1)

Part 5112 - Video Lottery Gaming Revenues (§ 5112.1 to 5112.5)

Part 5113 - SUSPENSIONS, REVOCATIONS AND OTHER DISCIPLINE (§ 5113.1 to 5113.8)

Part 5114 - Continuing Obligations Of Video Lottery Gaming Agents (§ 5114.1 to 5114.9)

Part 5115 - Video Lottery Gaming Agent Operation Certificate (§ 5115.1 to 5115.9)

Part 5116 - Marketing and Promotion Program (§ 5116.1 to 5116.11)

Part 5117 - RESTRICTIONS AT FACILITIES (§ 5117.1 to 5117.7)

Part 5118 - Conduct And Operation Of Video Lottery Gaming (§ 5118.1 to 5118.9)

Part 5119 - Video Lottery Terminal Component Standards (§ 5119.1 to 5119.3)

Part 5120 - The Daily Double (§ 5120.1 to 5120.2)

Part 5121 - Surveillance And Security (§ 5121.1 to 5121.9)

Part 5122 - Capital Improvements (§ 5122.1 to 5122.4)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
